abbreviations - this pattern is written in us terminology st/sts stitch/stitches slip_stitch slip_stitch chain chain single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet inv decrease invisible decrease tools and materials - 5 mm crochet hook - bernat premium #4 worsted medium - any colour - yarn needle - stitch marker - scissors - stuffing final size - 10 cm in diameter technical notes *finish all pieces before attaching them together *make sure you stuff all pieces that need to be filled *at the end of each round is a stitch count in brackets *link to youtube video is at the bottom of the pattern head green round 1 make a magic_ring into the magic_ring make 6 single_crochet 6 sts round 2 make 2 single_crochet in each st around 12 sts round 3 make 2 single_crochet in the first st followed by 1 single_crochet in the next st repeat around 18 sts round 4 make 2 single_crochet in the first st followed by 1 single_crochet in the next 2 sts repeat around 24 sts round 5-8 make 1 single_crochet in each st around 24 sts round 9 make 1 single_crochet inv decrease followed by 1 single_crochet in the next 2 sts repeat around 18 sts round 10 make 1 single_crochet inv decrease followed by 1 single_crochet in the next st repeat around 12 sts round 11 make 6 single_crochet inv decrease 6 sts *stuff and fasten_off make sure to leave yarn to sew the head onto the coaster mouth green round 1 make a magic_ring into the magic_ring make 6 single_crochet 6 sts round 2 make 2 single_crochet in each st around 12 sts round 3-4 make 1 single_crochet in each st around 12 sts *make a slip_stitch in the next stitch and fasten_off leave 20 cm of yarn to sew the mouth to the face ears green make two round 1 make a magic_ring into the magic_ring make 3 half_double_crochet and 1 slip_stitch 4 sts *fasten_off and leave 10 cm of yarn to attach the ears to the head body/coaster green round 1 make a magic_ring chain 2 into the magic_ring make 10 double_crochet join with a slip_stitch 10 sts round 2 chain 2 make 2 double_crochet in each st around join with a sl st 20 sts round 3 chain 2 make 2 double_crochet in the first st followed by 1 double_crochet in the next st repeat around join with a slip_stitch 30 sts round 4 chain 2 make 1 double_crochet in the next 2 sts followed by 2 double_crochet in the next st repeat around join with a slip_stitch 40 sts round 5 chain 1 make 1
